playerItems.h1: Indian Para Athletes Make History at Hangzhou Asian Para Games
Unprecedented 111 Medals
playerItems.p: Indian para athletes achieve the country's biggest medal haul in a major international multi-sport event.

playerItems.h1: Fifth Place Finish
playerItems.p: India finishes fifth in the medals tally, below China, Iran, Japan, and Korea.

playerItems.h1: Historic Achievement
playerItems.p: Paralympic Committee of India president Deepa Malik expresses pride and anticipates success at the Paris Paralympics.

playerItems.h1: Medal Breakdown
playerItems.p: Athletics contributes the most medals, followed by shuttlers, chess, archery, and shooting.

playerItems.h1: Final Day Success
playerItems.p: On the concluding day, India adds 12 medals, including four gold, from chess, athletics, and rowing.

playerItems.h1: Rahul Gandhi's Promises in Chhattisgarh Election Rally
Free Education in Government Institutions
playerItems.p: Rahul Gandhi pledges free education from KG to PG in Chhattisgarh.

playerItems.h1: Caste Census if Congress Retains Power
playerItems.p: Gandhi promises a caste census if the Congress wins at the Centre.

playerItems.h1: Support for Tendu Leaves Collectors
playerItems.p: â‚¹4,000 per year under the Rajiv Gandhi Protsahan Yojana.

playerItems.h1: Focus on Tribal Rights in Mizoram
playerItems.p: Congress vows to protect land, forests, and tribal rights.

playerItems.h1: Critique of BJP and Industrialists
playerItems.p: Rahul Gandhi claims BJP favors a few industrialists.

playerItems.h1: Supreme Court Constitutes Bench for Electoral Bonds Challenge
Constitution Bench to Hear Electoral Bonds Challenge
playerItems.p: Chief Justice Chandrachud to head Bench with four Associate Judges.

playerItems.h1: Case Pending for Over Eight Years
playerItems.p: The case has been pending in the apex court for over eight years.

playerItems.h1: Focus on Two Key Issues
playerItems.p: Petitioners focus on legality of anonymous donations and citizens' right to information.

playerItems.h1: No Decision on Money Bill Status Yet
playerItems.p: Bench may await a seven-judge Bench to decide on Money Bill status.

playerItems.h1: Israeli Warplanes Bomb Hamas Tunnels in Gaza
Israeli warplanes strike Hamas tunnels and bunkers
playerItems.p: Fighter jets hit dozens of underground targets.

playerItems.h1: Information blackout in Gaza due to bombardment
playerItems.p: Communication cut off, isolating 2.3 million people.

playerItems.h1: Continuous airstrikes light up Gaza City
playerItems.p: Explosions illuminated the city after nightfall.

playerItems.h1: Disruption of telecom services in Gaza
playerItems.p: Paltel reports complete disruption of Internet, phone services.

playerItems.h1: Israel's Defense Minister vows to continue attacks on Hamas
playerItems.p: Clear instructions for forces to continue operations.

playerItems.h1: Turkish President Erdogan defends Hamas
playerItems.p: Calls Hamas not a terrorist organization and criticizes Israel.

playerItems.h1: Pro-Palestinian demonstrators march in London
playerItems.p: Demanding a British government call for a ceasefire.
